org.activebpel.rt.axis
Class AeWsdlTrimmer

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.axis.AeWsdlTrimmer
public class AeWsdlTrimmer
extends java.lang.Object

Utility class that removes all WSDL elements which do not pertain to this service deployment.

Method Detail

trimWSDLDefinition

public static void trimWSDLDefinition(AeBPELExtendedWSDLDef aDef,
                                      javax.xml.namespace.QName aPortType,
                                      java.util.List aAllowedMethods,
                                      java.lang.String aTransportUrl)
                               throws org.apache.axis.AxisFault
Removes all elements which do not pertain to this service deployment. This includes port types and messages which are not part of this deployment. Also remove bindings and services which may have been specified, since we should be providing this in the concrete class implementation. Finally remove any BPEL specific WSDL declarations.

Parameters:
aDef - the WSDL definition
aPortType - the Port Type
aAllowedMethods - list of methods to keep in generated WSDL
aTransportUrl -
Throws:
org.apache.axis.AxisFault
